meanings.definition: Resembling a rash in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her skin had a rashlike redness after being out in the sun too long.
meanings.sent2: The plant's leaves had a rashlike texture, causing irritation when touched.
meanings.sent3: The rashlike pattern on the wallpaper made it look like the room was blushing.
meanings.sent4: The rashlike spots on the map indicated areas of high volcanic activity.
meanings.sent5: The rashlike bumps on the fruit made it unappealing to eat.
